description1: Featuring a 15.49-cm (6.1) all-screen Liquid Retina LCD and a glass and aluminum design, the iPhone 11 is as beautiful as it gets. Also, the IP68 rating ensures that is water-resistant up to 2 meters for 30 minutes.

specification1: 3 GB RAM | 32 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 512 GB 15.75 cm (6.2 inch) HD+ Display 13MP + 2MP | 8MP Front Camera  4000 mAh Lithium-ion Battery MediaTek MT6762 Processor
description1: The Samsung Galaxy A10s smartphone is here to make your life simpler by facilitating efficient performance along with impressive battery life. Its 15.79 cm (6.2) HD+ immersive screen and the Infinity-V display will make sure that every visual you watch on the screen is a delight. That’s not all, you can capture clear pictures with this smartphone’s 13 MP + 2 MP dual rear camera and the 8 MP front camera.

description1: The Realme 5i is here to meet your smartphone demands seamlessly as it houses a massive 5000 mAh battery and is powered by a 2.0 GHz Qualcomm Snapdragon 665 AIE Processor. Make photography a serious business with its AI Quad camera that features a 12 MP Primary Lens, 8 MP Ultra Wide-Angle Lens, 2 MP Super Macro Lens and 2 MP Portrait Lens.
